remarks: The multinomial formula for the ` k ` -th derivative of a finite product.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dvnprodlem3.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvnprodlem3.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
dvnprodlem3.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. Fin ) $.
dvnprodlem3.h $e |- ( ( ph /\ t e. T ) -> ( H ` t ) : X --> CC ) $.
dvnprodlem3.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
dvnprodlem3.dvnh $e |- ( ( ph /\ t e. T /\ j e. ( 0 ... N ) ) -> ( ( S Dn ( H ` t ) ) ` j ) : X --> CC ) $.
dvnprodlem3.f $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> prod_ t e. T ( ( H ` t ) ` x ) ) $.
dvnprodlem3.d $e |- D = ( s e. ~P T |-> ( n e. NN0 |-> { c e. ( ( 0 ... n ) ^m s ) | sum_ t e. s ( c ` t ) = n } ) ) $.
dvnprodlem3.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> { c e. ( ( 0 ... n ) ^m T ) | sum_ t e. T ( c ` t ) = n } ) $.
dvnprodlem3 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S Dn F ) ` N ) = ( x e. X |-> sum_ c e. ( C ` N ) ( ( ( ! ` N ) / prod_ t e. T ( ! ` ( c ` t ) ) ) x. prod_ t e. T ( ( ( S Dn ( H ` t ) ) ` ( c ` t ) ) ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d C c $.
$d D c j n s t x $.
$d D c j t $.
$d D c t $.
$d F s $.
$d H c j n s t x $.
$d H c j t $.
$d H c t $.
$d N c j n s t x $.
$d N c j t $.
$d S c j n s t x $.
$d S c j t $.
$d S c t $.
$d T c j n s t x $.
$d T c j t $.
$d X c j n s t x $.
$d X c j t $.
$d X c t $.
$d c j ph t $.
$d n ph s t x $.
$d n s t x $.
